verbose_text: Perren et al. [XREF_BIBR] reported that neurofibromin expression was negative in an insulinoma of the pancreas in a patient with NF-1, but that neurofibromin expression was strongly positive in a sporadic insulinoma on immunohistochemistry; in addition, neurofibromin expression was reduced at the mRNA level in the insulinoma of the pancreas in a patient with NF-1.
